title: Loveless Cafe logo ID
content:
Hey,

Does anyone know which fonts are used in the Loveless Cafe logo?

Any help would be great!

Thanks,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105833im_/http:/typophile.com/files/5973_logo_5258.jpg)
author: frataylor

comments.content:
MVB Magnesium is \*very\* close to “THE, CAFE.” (The H in “THE” has a narrower left leg than Magnesium.)

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/mvbfonts/mvb-magnesium/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105833/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/mvbfonts/mvb-magnesium/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/mvbfonts/mvb-magnesium/")
